name: libertine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
old-fashioned or literary a person, usually a man, who has few moral principles and has sexual relationships with many people: She considers him an arrogant, dandified libertine. The infamous libertine Casanova was more complex than the sexual braggart he is often depicted as.
someone who forms their own opinions and beliefs about religion: Like many libertines, he defames the deity in the hope of provoking a reprisal, which will at least demonstrate whether God exists.
More examplesFewer examplesAt least two notorious libertines, Lord Sedley and Lord Buckhurst, took her to bed.He had the good looks and commanding physical presence of a libertine, with the voice to match.He was a libertine, and recognized no God to whom he was responsible.
